Author: tholin

Author: 246tnt
Content: I don't think it's used in the default flow, but updating it is definitely needed to not have invalid cross references in the PDK.

Author: 246tnt
Content: And given the GDS changed size, those offsets have definitely changed so the current PDK has incoherent views which is not good.

Author: tholin
Content: This is why, for all my SCLs, I generate separate GDSII files for each cell. Its a lot more files and looks like a mess, but its impossible to accidentally have everything suddenly have an invalid reference.

Author: tholin
Content: I....donâ€™t know how they even generated those byte offsets in the first place.

Author: 246tnt
Content: You just do `gds readonly true` / `gds read xxx.gds` / `writeall`  and this will rewrite mag views for all the cells in the GDS that was read.
